location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 13 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting that the HC Cruizer Nautilushas returned to Bushire from Katiffe [Al-Qaṭīf]. It notes that the ships commander Captain George Herne has not been able to communicate with Shaikh Mohomed been Erraher, as he was away in the interior.
